Heading: Paper Bag Making Machine
Description: Nessco India, your premier destination for a paper bag making machine. As a globally recognized paper bag machine manufacturer with over 40 years of experience. We merge cutting edge technology with skilled craftsmanship to build sustainable packaging solutions. Our machine produces a wide range of paper bags, including shopping bags, grocery bags, bakery bags and pouch bags tailored to meet your diverse packaging needs.
PointsHeadingDesc: Nessco high speed paper bag manufacturing machine has equipped with Latest Technology which results in improved Production ,Stability and product Quality. All use of standard drive parts, Production Versatility, Excellent Interchangeability, Easy Maintenance of Equipment. The machine is more convenient, efficient and stable while in operation. One can produce paper bags of various applications like shopping bags, gift/goodies bags, carry bags, food bags and many more.
ImageDescription: Nessco offers a stunning Fully Automatic Paper Bag Making Machine with dimensions of 1500x6000x2700, capable of producing  between 30 to 200 bags per minute.The new feature of this machine is its power supply: 380V 3 Phase, which ensure reliable and efficient operation.This bag making machine is equipped with German photoelectric sensors which enables precise tracking of paper movement throughout the machine whether it is alignment of paper, unwinding or rewinding of paper. This machine comes with a series of functions including printing tracking, cutting, bottom indentation, bottom folding, bottom gluing to make your production process smooth and easy.
